en: Approved by the National Economic Council in January 2019, the Plan represents the most comprehensive effort to overhaul Nigerias inefficient and grossly underperforming livestock system.

en: It is animated by the hope that over a period of 10 years, predominantly nomadic pastoralists will be persuaded to move their cattle into ranches and public grazing reserves, where breedingg farms and other mechanised livestock management practices are to bolster the sectors productivity.

Electronic signatures, also known as e-signatures, are digital representations of a person's written signature. They can be used to authenticate the identity of the signer and confirm their consent to the terms of a document or agreement. In many countries, including the United States and the European Union, e-signatures are legally recognized and enforceable, provided they meet certain criteria such as being uniquely linked to the signer, being capable of identifying the signer, and being created using secure technology.

However, it is important to note that the validity of an e-signature may depend on the specific laws and regulations of the jurisdiction where the signing party resides or where the agreement is to be performed. It is always advisable to consult with a qualified attorney or legal professional to ensure that your e-signature meets all relevant legal requirements.</s>

en: The Malam Alu Agro Allied Company, a farm sitting on a 100-hectare land in Faru village, along Maiduguri road, Birnin Kudu Local Government Area of Jigawa State, is changing the perception of mechanised farming in Nigeria, Mansur Dau Aliyu, the company's Group General Manager (GGM) said.
pcm: Di Malam Alu Agro Allied Company, wey be farm wey dey on top 100-hectare of land inside Faru village, along Maiduguri road, Birnin Kudu Local Government Area of Jigawa State, don dey change di prception inside mechanised farming for Nigeria, di GM for di Mansur Dau Aliyu tok.
llama:
Sure, I can help you with that! Here's the translation of the Nigerian-Pidgin sentence to English:

en: The establishment of the farm almost five years ago, it was gathered, was a direct response to the call by the President Muhammadu Buhari-led administration for Nigerians to return to agriculture as the mainstay of the nation's economy, rather than relying solely on oil as the only source of revenue for the country.
pcm: As dem take establish di farm almost five years ago, as we gather, na direct response to di call by di administration of President Muhammadu Buhari tok say make Nigeria return to agriculture as di mainstay of di economy for inside di nation, pass as dem dey rely on top iol as di source of revenue for inside di kontri.
llama:
Sure, I can help you with that! Here's the translation of the Nigerian-Pidgin sentence to English:
